page.title: 16FAMILY LIFE IN PENICUIK
page.content: There are two children in my family, my brother called Kenneth aged 13 and me. I am a girl called Karen and I am 12 years old. Both my mum and dad work. My dad is employed by the Institute of Geological Buildings. About three times a year he goes out to sea collecting rocks. My mum is a cleaner at Mauricewood Primary School.It is a part-time job. We live in a semi-detached 5 apartment house in a private housing estate called Mauricewood. We have a V.W. car. Every Monday and Thursday we go to Penicuik Harriers which is an athletics club. There is lots to do but we prefer just to run. Most weekends we are away to different places to run. We have two colour and one black and white television. We have a Dragon 32 computer at home.
